channel.title: Uuencode on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Uuencode on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Encoded, Decoded
item.description: Today in Tedium: As I pointed out earlier this year, people love free stuff when it comes to the internet. Beyond communication, it may be the most popular use of the internet around. But what happens when a platform intended for communication becomes overwhelmed by free stuff? To put it simply, thatâ€™s what Usenet is. The protocol, with a history that goes back nearly 40 years, evolved from its arcane roots as a place for technically minded college students and sysops to communicate into a newbie-overrun protocol, then into a major hub for file sharing.
